property.name: fs.s3a.path.style.access
property.description: Enables S3 path style access that is disabling the default virtual hosting behavior(default: false)

property.name: fs.s3a.connection.timeout
property.description: Sets the total timeout of the connection operation

property.name: fs.s3a.attempts.maximum
property.description: Sets the total number of attempts that will be tried. Default is 20!

property.name: fs.s3a.connection.establish.timeout
property.description: Sets the connection timeout to 3 seconds, default is 5

property.name: fs.s3a.retry.limit
property.description: Sets the number of times that the whole process is retried
